settings.title: Keybind Cheatsheet Settings
settings.description: Configure the appearance and keybind sources for the cheatsheet panel.
settings.auto-height-hint: When 'Auto' is enabled, height adjusts automatically based on content.
settings.columns-hint: More columns work better with wider windows.
settings.config-paths-description: Specify custom paths to your keybind configuration files. The plugin will automatically parse the appropriate file based on your compositor and follow all include/source directives.
settings.hyprland-format-hint:
Expected format: bind = $mod, KEY, action #"description"
Categories: # 1. CATEGORY NAME
settings.niri-format-hint:
Categories are created with: // #"Category Name"
Descriptions: hotkey-overlay-title="description"
settings.refresh-message: Keybinds will be reloaded when you open the panel.
settings.reset-message: Settings have been reset to defaults.
settings.keybind-setup-description: To open the cheatsheet with a keyboard shortcut, add this bind to your compositor config:
settings.keybind-example-hyprland: Hyprland example: bind = $mod, F1, exec, qs -c "noctalia-shell" ipc call "plugin:keybind-cheatsheet" "toggle"
settings.mod-var-hint: The variable name used for your Super key (e.g., $mod or $mainMod).

editor.title: Keybind Editor
editor.confirm-delete: Are you sure you want to delete this keybind?
editor.confirm-delete-category: Are you sure you want to delete this category and all its keybinds?
